column2: select top # G.objid, G.ra, G.dec, G.lnLExp_r, G.lnLDev_r, # as p_acw, # as elliptical, # as spiral, # as nvote, # as mE1_u, # as mE1_g, G.mE1_r, # as mE1_i, # as mE1_z, # as mE2_u, # as mE2_g, G.mE2_r, # as mE2_i, # as mE2_z, # as mRrCc_u, # as mRrCc_g, G.mRrCc_r, # as mRrCc_i, # as mRrCc_z, # as mRrCcPSF_u, # as mRrCcPSF_g, G.mRrCcPSF_r, # as mRrCcPSF_i, # as mRrCcPSF_z, # as mE1PSF_u, # as mE1PSF_g, G.mE1PSF_r, # as mE1PSF_i, # as mE1PSF_z, # as mE2PSF_u, # as mE2PSF_g, G.mE2PSF_r, # as mE2PSF_i, # as mE2PSF_z into mydb.SDSS_Elliptical_rBand_Correlation_Fixed from dbo.Galaxy as G G.lnlDev_r > G.lnlExp_r + # -- the likelihood of the deVaucouleours profile fit is #% greater than the -- likelihood of the exponential fit and G.lnlExp_r > # -- and the likelihoods are actually meaningful and (G.flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) > # -- and it is detected from at least one of the binned images and (G.flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) ! = dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) -- and, if it is blended, it is either a child or not deblended further and (G.flags & (dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) + dbo.fPhotoFlags (#) )) = # -- and it is not near a ccd edge or saturated, where measurements may be bad and G.petroMag_i > # -- and it is fainter than # in i-band and (G.petroMag_r > # or G.petroR5#_r > #) and (G.petroMag_r > # and G.g > # and G.r > # and G.i > #) and ( (G.petroMag_r - G.extinction_r) < # and (G.petroMag_r - G.extinction_r < (# + (#/#) * (G.g - G.r) + # * (G.r - G.i) - # * #) ) and ( (G.r - G.i - (G.g - G.r) /# - #) < #) and ( (G.r - G.i - (G.g - G.r) /# - #) > #) ) or ( (G.petroMag_r - G.extinction_r < #) and ( (G.r - G.i - (G.g - G.r) /# - #) > (# - #* (G.g - G.r) )) and ( (G.g - G.r) > (# + # * (G.r - G.i) )) ) -- and many constraints on colors and mags to make it have elliptical-type colors. and (mE1_r> #) and (mE2_r> #) and (mRrCc_r> #) and (mRrCcPSF_r> #) and (mE1PSF_r> #) and (mE2PSF_r> #)
